account.clickIfNotRedirected: If you are not redirected, please click on the link above.

contact.changeLoginData: Your mobile phone number and e-mail address are required in order to contact you. If you wish to change your login data, please click here:

account.dateFieldFormat: The format does not correspond to a valid date (dd.mm.yyyy).

digitalOnboarding.fullfillsRequirementsMessage: You meet the requirements for identification using live verification by means of artificial intelligence. For the identification process, you will be leaving the Confederation’s infrastructure. The identification process using live verification by means of artificial intelligence is conducted by an external company (Identity verification via document scan and liveness check from fidentity AG).
digitalOnboarding.fullfillsRequirementsMessageBold: You will be notified of the change in your status shortly after the identification process is successfully completed. If identification fails, you will be contacted by a member of our staff.
digitalOnboarding.fullfillsRequirementsMessageError: Unfortunately, you do not meet the requirements for identification using live verification by means of artificial intelligence. Please contact us to proceed with identification:
digitalOnboarding.hasIdFromCountry: Or from which country do you hold a valid identity card?
digitalOnboarding.hasPassportFromCountry: From which country do you hold a valid passport?
digitalOnboarding.hasSmartphoneOrComputer: Do you have access to a smartphone with a camera?
digitalOnboarding.noIdOfListedCountry: I do not hold an identity card from one of the countries listed
digitalOnboarding.noPassportOfListedCountry: I do not hold a passport from one of the countries listed
digitalOnboarding.passportAndIdNeeded: You need a valid means of identification (passport or identity card).
digitalOnboarding.startInfo: Press «Start» to begin the identification process.
digitalOnboarding.videochatLink: Continue online identification (24 hours a day, 7 days a week)
digitalOnboarding.fidentityError: The identification has failed. Try again later or contact
digitalOnboarding.wizardInfo: Please answer the following questions so that the identification process can be prepared.

checkoutOrderDetailsStep.datumLesesaalText: I would like to consult the documents in the reading room on
checkoutOrderDetailsStep.invalidDate: The reading room is not open on this day. Please select a valid date.
checkoutOrderDetailsStep.mandatoryArtDerArbeit: Please indicate the nature of the work for which you require the documents.
checkoutOrderDetailsStep.mandatoryDate: Please select a date for your visit to the reading room.

checkoutReasonsStep.missingFlagForReason: When giving a reason you must select this checkbox.
checkoutReasonsStep.missingReason: Please state a reason why you wish to consult documents containing personal data.
checkoutReasonsStep.title: Bodies that deliver records may consult the records they have supplied during the closure period. In order to consult them, you must be authorised by your administrative unit, which will also be notified automatically every time you order records of this kind.
checkoutReasonsStep.title2: If these records contain personal data, they may only be borrowed for specific reasons
checkoutReasonsStep.yesTheseItemsContainsPersonData: Yes, these records contain personal data

checkoutSubmittedStep.cartText: You still have open orders in your shopping cart.
checkoutSubmittedStep.checkStatusText: You can monitor the status of your order in your user account.
checkoutSubmittedStep.disclaimerText: The identification process using live verification by means of artificial intelligence will be recorded, but the recording will be deleted once identification is complete. The Federal Archives will store only a copy of the identification document, the photograph and the user information in tabular form. You may request information about your stored data at any time (Art. 8 FADP).
checkoutSubmittedStep.thxTextDigi: Thank you for your order. You will receive an e-mail as soon as the documents have been digitised. It will normally take two weeks to process your order.
checkoutSubmittedStep.thxTextEischtisgesuch: We will forward your request to the office responsible. You will normally receive a decision within four to six weeks.
checkoutSubmittedStep.thxTextEischtisgesuchAnmeldenUndIndentif: If your request is approved, you will need to identify yourself in order to consult the documents (see Registration and identification).
checkoutSubmittedStep.thxTextEischtisgesuchIntroduction: Thank you for your request to consult the following documents:
checkoutSubmittedStep.thxTextLesesaal: Thank you for your order. You can view the documents on your chosen date in the Federal Archives reading room. The reading room is open Tuesday to Thursday from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m.
checkoutSubmittedStep.thxTextVerwaltungsausleihe: Thank you for your order. You will receive your documents within one to two working days by post.

collections.notFound: Collection is not available in the selected language
collections.notNumber: The url of the collection is wrong

dateRangeField.invalidFormat: The format you have supplied is invalid. Please enter a time period in either "YYYY-YYYY" or "DD.MM.YYYY-DD.MM.YYYY" format.

detail.notFound: The page you have requested cannot be displayed
detail.notFoundMessage: It is possible that you do not have the necessary rights. Please check your rights in your user account.
detail.notFoundMessage2: If you have questions about accessibility of documents in the Federal Archives, please contact our advice service or send an e-mail to info@bar.admin.ch.
detail.notFoundMessageNotOe1: It is possible that you do not have the necessary rights to access the page. Please check your rights in your user account.
detail.notFoundMessageOe1: It is possible that you do not have the necessary rights to access the page (see Login and identification).

detailSection.internalField: Field only visible to SFA users

download.thresholdExceeded: You have already downloaded {1} files in the last {0}. You have therefore reached the maximum number of files. You will be able to make another download in {2}. Alternatively you can request the Federal Archives to increase your download allocation.

downloadSection.pleaseLogin: Please log in to order the documents
downloadSection.preparationPending: You will receive an e-mail when preparation is complete. You can now close the page.
downloadSection.preparationRequired: These documents are already available in digital form but must be prepared for download.
downloadSection.downloadNow: Download the documents now. In the index.html file you will find an overview of all the documents.

einsichtCheckoutOrderDetailsStep.eigenePersonendatenTitel: Do the documents relate to yourself?
einsichtCheckoutOrderDetailsStep.gesuchDauerInfo: Please note that it may take four to six weeks to process a consultation request.
einsichtCheckoutOrderDetailsStep.identifizierung: In order to submit a request for information you must first identify yourself. You can apply for identification in your user account identification function.
einsichtCheckoutOrderDetailsStep.infoTextAbschnittDrei: . The authorisation to consult records is only valid for the person making the request.
einsichtCheckoutOrderDetailsStep.infoTextAbschnittEins: To consult records that are still subject to a closure period, you require authorisation, which you must apply for by submitting a request to the Federal Archives. You can have consultation requests for a maximum of 50 dossiers undergoing processing at any one time.
einsichtCheckoutOrderDetailsStep.infoTextAbschnittZwei: We will then forward your request to the office responsible. You will normally receive a decision within four to six weeks. If your request is approved, you must identify yourself to consult the documents
einsichtCheckoutOrderDetailsStep.mandatoryArtDerArbeit: Please indicate the nature of the work for which you require the documents.
einsichtCheckoutOrderDetailsStep.mandatoryOwnPersondata: Please indicate whether the documents relate to yourself.
einsichtCheckoutOrderDetailsStep.mandatoryPersondata: Please indicate whether the research relates to a specific person.
einsichtCheckoutOrderDetailsStep.mandatoryReason: Please give a reason for your consultation request.
einsichtCheckoutOrderDetailsStep.personendatenTitel: Does your research relate to a specific person (e.g. biography or article on someone’s life and work)?

orderCheckoutPage.warningMessagePart1: Owing to high demand, the digitisation infrastructure is currently under heavy load. You should therefore expect longer processing times for your order. simpleHit.addedToBasketText: "{0}" was successfully added to the shopping cart.
simpleHit.alreadyAddedToBasketText: "{0}" is already in the shopping cart.
simpleHit.digitalAvailableText: This dossier is already available in digital form. You can view it here or download it.
simpleHit.explanationCaption: Relevance was calculated by ElasticSearch on the basis of the following values:
simpleHit.failedBecauseOfLevelMessage: This unit of description is not available to order. If you have any questions, please contact our advice service or e-mail us at bestellung@bar.admin.ch.
simpleHit.loginToUseBasketText: Please log in to use the shopping cart.

noHitsInfo.header: There are a number of potential reasons why your search did not return any results:
noHitsInfo.reason1: The Federal Archives publishes metadata containing names of persons and personal data or personality profiles requiring special protection only after the protection period has expired.
noHitsInfo.reason2: The documents you are looking for have not yet been catalogued and recorded in the system.
noHitsInfo.reason3: Spelling error or unknown search terms: please check the spelling or search for other terms.
noHitsInfo.reason4: There are no documents on your topic in the Federal Archives. You can find further archives in the database Archivadressen der Schweiz, the research portal archivesonline.org or on the Archives Portal Europe.
noHitsInfo.showHinweis: Do not show this tip again

simpleHit.noHitsTitle: No results for your search term
simpleHit.noHitsTitleForQuery: No archival materials corresponding to your search - {0} - were found.
simpleHit.oe3RoleRequired: To order documents with an authorisation to consult, you require "identified user" status. To proceed to the identification process please click on this notice.
simpleHit.reason1Oe1: It is possible that you do not have the necessary rights (see Registration & identification).
simpleHit.reason1Oe2: It is possible that you do not have the necessary rights. Please check your rights in your user account.

infoSection.noPermission: These data were anonymised for data protection reasons (Art. 12.3 Archiving Ordinance).
infoSection.barUser: For users without the necessary authorisation, this data is displayed in anonymised form.

staticContent.errorMessage: The page you have requested cannot be displayed
staticContent.errorTitle: Error loading the page. System message: {0}

syntaxHelp.fuzzy: Search for similar but not identical words using the fuzzy operator.
syntaxHelp.fuzzyExample: E.g. in order to find "Bundesrat", "Bundesräte", "Bundesrats" etc., use: "Bundesrat~"
syntaxHelp.gewichtung: Use ^ to increase the weighting of a word.
syntaxHelp.hochkommas: Place quotation marks around a phrase to search for that exact phrase.
syntaxHelp.not: Use NOT to exclude individual terms.
syntaxHelp.or: Use OR between search terms to find all results containing one or other of the search terms.
syntaxHelp.proximity: Use proximity searches. The number indicates the maximum number of words between the terms.
syntaxHelp.wildcard: Use ? or * to replace one (?) or more (*) letters (not supported at the start of a word).
